title: Curs de Cuina Algeriana

content: Curs de cuina Algeriana La cuina algeriana √©s reconeguda pel seu sabor √∫nic i delici√≥s, fruit de la influ√®ncia de diferents cultures que han passat per aquest pa√≠s. Destaca per la seva varietat d‚Äôingredients i l'√∫s de t√®cniques culin√†ries tradicionals. A m√©s, moltes de les receptes s√≥n saludables i nutritives. En resum, la cuina algeriana ofereix una combinaci√≥ perfecta de sabor i salut.
title: Curs de Cuina Algeriana

content: Plats que prepararem
title: Curs de Cuina Algeriana

content: Couscous La preparaci√≥ del couscous comen√ßa amb la preparaci√≥ de la semola de blat, que es remulla en aigua i es frega amb oli per donar-li una textura suau i uniforme. Despr√©s es cuina el couscous en una cassola especial anomenada couscoussi√®re, on s‚Äôafegeixen les verdures i la carn. El couscous es cuina a foc lent fins que estigui tendre i suau.
title: Curs de Cuina Algeriana

content: Tagine La preparaci√≥ del tagine comen√ßa amb la preparaci√≥ de la carn o el peix, que es cuina a foc lent amb verdures i esp√®cies en una cassola especial anomenada tagine. Les esp√®cies t√≠piques inclouen c√∫rcuma, com√≠, cilantre i pebre negre. El tagine es cuina a foc lent durant diverses hores fins que la carn estigui tendra i suau.
title: Curs de Cuina Algeriana

content: Mechoui La preparaci√≥ del mechoui comen√ßa amb la preparaci√≥ de la carn d‚Äôovella, que es rosta en un forn de llenya durant diverses hores fins que estigui tendra i suculenta. S‚Äôafegeixen esp√®cies com c√∫rcuma, com√≠ i pebre negre per donar-li un sabor intens i delici√≥s. El mechoui es serveix calent, sovint amb una salsa de cilantre i llimona.
title: Curs de Cuina Algeriana

content: Chorba La preparaci√≥ de la chorba comen√ßa amb la preparaci√≥ de la carn, que es cuina a foc lent amb verdures i esp√®cies. Despr√©s s‚Äôafegeix cusc√∫s i es cuina fins que estigui suau. La chorba es serveix calenta, sovint amb una mica de llimona expressada per damunt per donar-li un toc d‚Äôacidesa.
title: Curs de Cuina Algeriana

content: Brik La preparaci√≥ del brik comen√ßa amb la preparaci√≥ de la massa, que es fa amb farina, aigua i oli. Despr√©s es farceix amb carn picada, ou i altres ingredients com ceba i pebrot. El brik es fregeix en oli calent fins que estigui cruixent i daurat. Es serveix calent, sovint amb salsa de tom√†quet o olives. title: Curs de Cuina Algeriana

title: Curs de Cuina Marroquina

content: Curs de cuina Marroquina El nostre xef de cuina marroqu√≠ √©s excel¬∑lent en el que fa. Els seus plats s√≥n una combinaci√≥ perfecta de sabors i aromes, que deliten els sentits de qui els prova. A m√©s, utilitza ingredients frescos i de qualitat en totes les seves receptes, cosa que li permet oferir menjars saludables i deliciosos. A m√©s, el nostre xef √©s un expert en la cuina marroquina i sempre est√† disposat a compartir el seu coneixement i habilitats amb els altres. En resum, el nostre xef de cuina marroqu√≠ √©s un veritable mestre en el seu camp i el seu treball sempre √©s una del√≠cia per a tots els que tenen el plaer de gaudir-ne.
title: Curs de Cuina Marroquina

content: This article shows the basic Markdown syntax and format.
title: COntacto

content: This artiasfadsfcle offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files. Nota This article is a shameful copy of the great Grav original page. If you want to know about the extended Markdown syntax of LoveIt theme, please read extended Markdown syntax page. Let‚Äôs face it: Writing content for the Web is tiresome. WYSIWYG editors help alleviate this task, but they generally result in horrible code, or worse yet, ugly web pages. Markdown is a better way to write HTML, without all the complexities and ugliness that usually accompanies it. Some of the key benefits are: Markdown is simple to learn, with minimal extra characters, so it‚Äôs also quicker to write content. Less chance of errors when writing in Markdown. Produces valid XHTML output. Keeps the content and the visual display separate, so you cannot mess up the look of your site. Write in any text editor or Markdown application you like. Markdown is a joy to use! John Gruber, the author of Markdown, puts it like this: The overriding design goal for Markdown‚Äôs formatting syntax is to make it as readable as possible. The idea is that a Markdown-formatted document should be publishable as-is, as plain text, without looking like it‚Äôs been marked up with tags or formatting instructions. While Markdown‚Äôs syntax has been influenced by several existing text-to-HTML filters, the single biggest source of inspiration for Markdown‚Äôs syntax is the format of plain text email. ‚Äì John Gruber Without further delay, let us go over the main elements of Markdown and what the resulting HTML looks like! Consejo ¬†Bookmark this page for easy future reference!
title: COntacto

content:
1 Headings Headings from h2 through h6 are constructed with a # for each level: ## h2 Heading ### h3 Heading #### h4 Heading ##### h5 Heading ###### h6 Heading The HTML looks like this:

h2 Heading

h3 Heading

h4 Heading

h5 Heading
h6 Heading
Heading IDs To add a custom heading ID, enclose the custom ID in curly braces on the same line as the heading: ### A Great Heading {#custom-id} The HTML looks like this:

A Great Heading
title: COntacto

content: 2 Comments Comments should be HTML compatible. <!-- This is a comment --> Comment below should NOT be seen:
title: COntacto

content: 3 Horizontal Rules The HTML <hr> element is for creating a ‚Äúthematic break‚Äù between paragraph-level elements. In Markdown, you can create a <hr> with any of the following: ___: three consecutive underscores ---: three consecutive dashes ***: three consecutive asterisks The rendered output looks like this:
title: COntacto

content:
5 Inline HTML If you need a certain HTML tag (with a class) you can simply use HTML: Paragraph in Markdown.
This is HTML
Paragraph in Markdown.
title: COntacto

content: 6 Emphasis
title: COntacto

content: Bold For emphasizing a snippet of text with a heavier font-weight. The following snippet of text is rendered as bold text. **rendered as bold text** __rendered as bold text__ The HTML looks like this: rendered as bold text
title: COntacto

content: Italics For emphasizing a snippet of text with italics. The following snippet of text is rendered as italicized text. *rendered as italicized text* _rendered as italicized text_ The HTML looks like this: rendered as italicized text
title: COntacto

content: Strikethrough In GFMGitHub flavored Markdown you can do strikethroughs. ~~Strike through this text.~~ The rendered output looks like this: Strike through this text. The HTML looks like this: <del>Strike through this text.</del>
title: COntacto

content: Combination Bold, italics, and strikethrough can be used in combination. ***bold and italics*** ~~**strikethrough and bold**~~ ~~*strikethrough and italics*~~ ~~***bold, italics and strikethrough***~~ The rendered output looks like this: bold and italics strikethrough and bold strikethrough and italics bold, italics and strikethrough The HTML looks like this: bold and italics strikethrough and bold strikethrough and italics bold, italics and strikethrough The DojocatAlt text " The Dojocat With a reference later in the document defining the URL location: [id]: https://octodex.github.com/images/dojocat.jpg "The Dojocat" Consejo LoveIt theme has special shortcode for image, which provides more features.
title: COntacto

title: Curs de pastisseria √†rab

content: Curs de pastisseria √†rab Un curs de pastisseria √†rab pot oferir als participants l‚Äôoportunitat d‚Äôaprendre a preparar dol√ßos i pastissos tradicionals de la regi√≥ √†rab. Els xefs instructors poden ensenyar als estudiants a fer receptes delicioses com ara la baklava, la knafeh i la qatayef. Els estudiants tamb√© poden aprendre sobre la hist√≤ria i la cultura darrere d‚Äôaquests dol√ßos i com es preparen en diferents pa√Øsos √†rabs. A m√©s, poden obtenir consells sobre com triar els millors ingredients i t√®cniques de cuina perqu√® els seus pastissos quedin perfectes. Al final del curs, els participants tindran una millor comprensi√≥ de la pastisseria √†rab i hauran adquirit habilitats per preparar aquests dol√ßos a casa.
title: Curs de pastisseria √†rab

content: Baklava Un past√≠s fet de capes fines de pasta de full reblertes de nous i banyades en una deliciosa salsa de mel i sucre.
title: Curs de pastisseria √†rab

content: Knafeh Un dol√ß fet de formatge ratllat i cobert amb una capa de pasta de full cruixent banyada en una salsa de sucre i canyella.
title: Curs de pastisseria √†rab

content: Qatayef Un dol√ß rod√≥ fet de farina, llevat i aigua, reblert de nous i banyat en una salsa de mel i canyella.
title: Curs de pastisseria √†rab

content: Halva Una crema dol√ßa de llavors de s√®sam i sucre, que es pot comprar en diferents sabors com ara pistatxo o xocolata.
title: Curs de pastisseria √†rab

content: Luqaimat Un postre rod√≥ i dol√ß fet de farina, llevat i aigua, fregit en oli i banyat en una salsa de mel i canyella. Preu, horari & inscripci√≥ns Templates horaris, preus- inscripci√≥ns üí° this is called a call-out

content: About LoveIt
title: About LoveIt

content: ¬†LoveIt is a clean, elegant but advanced blog theme for Hugo developed by ‚ÄâMohamed. It is based on the original LeaveIt Theme and KeepIt Theme. Hugo Theme LoveItHugo Theme LoveIt " Hugo Theme LoveIt
title: About LoveIt

content: Features
title: About LoveIt

content: Performance and SEO ¬†Optimized for performance: 99/100 on mobile and 100/100 on desktop in Google PageSpeed Insights ¬†Optimized SEO performance with a correct SEO SCHEMA based on JSON-LD ¬†Google Analytics supported ¬†Fathom Analytics supported ¬†Plausible Analytics supported ¬†Yandex Metrica supported ¬†Search engine verification supported (Google, Bind, Yandex and Baidu) ¬†CDN for third-party libraries supported ¬†Automatically converted images with Lazy Load by lazysizes
title: About LoveIt

content: Appearance and Layout ¬†Desktop/Mobile responsive layout ¬†Light/Dark mode ¬†Globally consistent design language ¬†Pagination supported ¬†Easy-to-use and self-expanding table of contents ¬†Multilanguage supported and i18n ready ¬†Beautiful CSS animation
title: About LoveIt

content: Social and Comment Systems ¬†Gravatar supported by Gravatar ¬†Local Avatar supported ¬†Up to 73 social links supported ¬†Up to 24 share sites supported ¬†Disqus comment system supported by Disqus ¬†Gitalk comment system supported by Gitalk ¬†Valine comment system supported by Valine ¬†Facebook comments system supported by Facebook ¬†Telegram comments system supported by Comments ¬†Commento comment system supported by Commento ¬†utterances comment system supported by utterances ¬†giscus comment system supported by giscus
title: About LoveIt

content: Extended Features ¬†Search supported by Lunr.js or algolia ¬†Twemoji supported ¬†Automatically highlighting code ¬†Copy code to clipboard with one click ¬†Images gallery supported by lightGallery ¬†Extended Markdown syntax for Font Awesome icons ¬†Extended Markdown syntax for ruby annotation ¬†Extended Markdown syntax for fraction ¬†Mathematical formula supported by $\KaTeX$ ¬†Diagrams shortcode supported by mermaid ¬†Interactive data visualization shortcode supported by ECharts ¬†Mapbox shortcode supported by Mapbox GL JS ¬†Music player shortcode supported by APlayer and MetingJS ¬†Bilibili player shortcode ¬†Kinds of admonitions shortcode ¬†Custom style shortcode ¬†Custom script shortcode ¬†Animated typing supported by TypeIt ¬†Cookie consent banner supported by cookieconsent ¬†Person shortcode ‚Ä¶
title: About LoveIt
